title: Reference Frameworks
description: The architecture for Djinn üßû‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, is built using other frameworks as a reference, all of these frameworks provide a framework for the entire infrastructure but their implementation is not feasible unless a tight integration is done, and right now there is a plethora of devices, each using different protocols which are fragmented the market making it more difficult to provide a solution for each device, for this reason, the application chooses the most popular communication protocols and take inspiration on how different frameworks handle different problems.
